about_the_game:
A minimalist survival puzzle where every move counts.

In stopDrop., survival is a strategy. You are the player, navigating a perilous grid-based world where time, turns, and health are intertwined. Every action costs precious vitality, and enemies close in with every step. Can you outmaneuver the threats and reach the exit before your time runs out?

Key Features:

  • Turn-Based Survival: Plan each move carefully as time and turns drain your health.

  • Minimalist Design: Immerse yourself in sleek visuals and a clean interface, where focus is everything.

  • Challenging Enemies: Strategically evade foes that won’t stop until you’re gone.

  • Puzzle-Driven Progression: Solve intricate layouts and find the optimal path to survival.

  • Race Against Time: Survival isn't enough—you must escape before you expire.

  • Level Editor: Unleash your creativity with a powerful level editor to design and share your own challenges.

Outlast, outwit, and escape. Your life depends on it.

Can you stop, think, and drop into survival mode? Or will time and turns run out before you find the way?
